title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, the perfect addition to your holiday decorations! 

This set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-feet garland, both adorned with beautiful snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. The wreath and garland are pre-lit with 100 LED warm lights, creating a cozy and festive atmosphere.

Our LED lights feature a total count of 100, ensuring a bright and vibrant display. The lights are powered by 3 AA batteries, giving you the flexibility to place them anywhere without the need for a power outlet. With the convenient timer function, you can set the lights to automatically turn on for 6 hours and then off for 18 hours, saving energy and providing hassle-free operation.

Crafted with sturdy high-quality materials, our wreath and garland are built to last. They are hypoallergenic and feature fireproof pins for added safety. You can trust in the durability and longevity of this set, making it a worthwhile investment for years to come.

Maintenance is a breeze with our artificial wreath and garland. There's no need for water, and they will never fade, ensuring a fresh and vibrant appearance throughout the holiday season. 

Designed for both indoor and outdoor use, our wreath and garland set is versatile and can be placed in various locations such as walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows. Transform any space into a festive wonderland with ease.

To provide you with peace of mind, we offer a generous warranty period of 365 days. Our customer service team is available 24 hours a day, ready to assist you with any inquiries or concerns.

Don't miss out on this Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set that combines elegance, convenience, and durability. Make your holiday season truly magical with our exquisite decoration set.
